description: KOL Mindmap Trading Bot Configuration - Copy this file to config.json and customize as needed. Environment variables take precedence over these settings.

filter.minTradeVolume: Minimum total trade volume across all KOL connections (in USD). Higher values = more selective filtering. Default: 1000
filter.minConnectedKOLs: Minimum number of unique KOLs trading the token. More KOLs = stronger signal. Default: 3
filter.minInfluenceScore: Minimum average influence score across KOL connections (0-100). Default: 50
filter.minTotalTrades: Minimum total number of trades across all KOLs. More trades = more established activity. Default: 5

risk.takeProfitPercentage: Percentage gain to trigger automatic sell (1-1000). Default: 50 (50% profit)
risk.stopLossPercentage: Percentage loss to trigger automatic sell (1-100). Default: 20 (20% loss)
risk.trailingStopEnabled: Enable trailing stop loss. When enabled, stop loss adjusts upward as price increases. Default: true

trading.buyAmount: Amount to spend per trade (in SOL). Adjust based on your risk tolerance and capital. Default: 0.1

_comments.note: These comments are for documentation only and will be ignored by the bot. Remove the _comments section if you prefer a cleaner config file.
